casebody.data:
NOTESTINE MANOR, INC.
v.
LOGAN CTY. BD. OF REVISION. 2015-0791 Supreme Court of Ohio. March 14, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

O'Donnell and DeWine, JJ., dissent.

RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

Board of Tax Appeals, No. 2014-2543. Reported at --- Ohio St.3d ----, 2018-Ohio-2, --- N.E.3d ----. On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.
